TopicTitle: Can someone please tell me how to make a mod

Articles.Content: All I need is a few tips. Thanks in advance.

Not very specific on whether you want to make parts or plugins.

Tips thought:

Parts, learn to use the forum search as there are litterally loads of tutorials here already

Plugins, Learn how to program in C# first, you\'ll need it.
What are you looking to do? There are some really talented modders here that seem willing to share their knowledge, you\'ll just need to come up with some specific questions.

If you are starting out, I suggest Blender... Fairly simple and here are some tutorials:

Basic Tutorial here

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4032.0

Also this page helped me when I couldnt get it working:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6109.msg80222#msg80222

And finally the KSP wiki page for mod making here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=Making_an_asset_from_start_to_finish

Dom
